name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel IV - Eternal Preservation Edition
summary:
The long awaited finale to the epic engulfing a continent comes to a head in the final chapter of the Trails of Cold Steel saga!

This edition includes the following:
- The Legend of Heroes Trails of Cold Steel IV - The End of Saga
- Eternal Preservation Edition-exclusive book x 3 (Confidential Synopsis: Sen no Kiseki Uncensored / Sen no Kiseki II Uncensored / Sen no Kiseki III Uncensored)
- Original Illustration Letter "To Millium" by Altina
- Special box
